page.title: 18EVENTS-TORNADO HITS GOTHAM
page.content: { TORNADO HITS GOTHAM In this country we dont usually experience extreme weather conditions, such as tornadoes, but on Thursday August 1984 a tornado hit our small village of Gotham. It was 5.30p.m.and several people on their way home from work, noticed a strange shape moving across the sky. The older inhabitants living on the edge of the village were taken completly by surprise .One elderly couple first noticed things flying past the window pieces of wood, tiles, branches, waste paper, and a mass of birds.A shed roof was blown off and was carried over several gardens. Three garages were demolished, the bricks lying in a heap on the road.Windows were shattered, ornaments broken and glass was scattered everywhere.
